data.text:
Kingston Park Stadium, Newcastle upon Tyne, UK

Latitude and longitude coordinates are: 55.018715, -1.673066.

Kingston Park Stadium is a multi-use, 10,000-capacity stadium located at Brunton Rd, Newcastle upon Tyne, United Kingdom. It is a five-minute walk away from three Metro stations, five miles from Newcastle city center, and three miles from Newcastle International Airport. The stadium is home to Newcastle Falcons, Newcastle United Reserves, and Newcastle Thunder. Opened in 1990, designed by TTH Architects, the stadium is owned by Newcastle Falcons. It mostly hosts rugby union and rugby league games.

* Kingston Park will host three matches of the 2021 Rugby League World Cup.
